channel.title: Npc drop help
channel.description:
Im trying to add this to npcdrop.cfg Ignore them spaces there all straight in the .cfg FILE [code] npcdrop = 1111 13887 1 1 npcdrop = 1111 13893 1 1 npcdrop = 1111 13899 1 1 npcdrop = 1111 13905 1 1 npcdrop = 1112 13884 1 1 npcdrop = 1112 13890 1 1 npcdrop = 1112 13896 1 1 npcdrop = 1112 13902 1 1 npcdrop = 1113 13870 1 1 npcdrop = 1113 13873 1 1 npcdrop = 1113 13876 1 1 npcdrop = 1113 13879 1 1 npcdrop = 1113 13883 1 1 npcdrop = 1114 13862 1 1 npcdrop = 1114 13861 1 1 npcdrop = 1114 13864 1 1 npcdrop = 1114 13867 1 1 [/code]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/294hpuh.png[/img]
